title: Standing Split
description: Urdhva Prasarita Eka Padasana OORD-vah pra-SAR-ee-tah eh-kuh PAH-DAH-sah-nah Forward bends, Inversions, Standing Primary body parts engaged Ankles, Calves, Hamstrings Stretches and strengthens legs Stimulates kidneys and liver
alignment_cues: Maintain steady breath throughout the pose
Keep proper alignment based on pose type
Listen to your body and modify as needed
